events.name: Energy indication for each card slot

events.comment: Clear the effect of any previously activated card

Note: 
- O1 = Speed boost
- O2 = Nitro
- N1 = F-Drifting
- N2 = Zeus
- D1 = Chris!
- D2 = B.U.S
- D3 = Spray n Pray

Don't recognise it as braking if F-Drifting is active
If has brake on OR Colliding: decelerate
elif moving outside of road: decelerate at lower rate
Accelerate if currently slower than player
Decelerate if currently faster than player
Calculate distance between player and pursuer
Distance from spawn of pursuer and player

Wait for obstacles to come in -> Show Dialogue
